attributes.action: disallow the use of the word "Honourable" when addressing MPs for the remainder of this Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since so many Members of  Parliament have proved themselves to be far less than honorable, the phrases “My honorable friend” and “The Right honorable member” should be discontinued for the remainder of this parliament until the British Public can exercise our right to install new honorable members back into power. And stop breaching my democratic rights by rejecting this petition.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Parliament: 
http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
